title: Attention New York, North Carolina, Oklahoma & Idaho - This is your last day to register to vote
selftext:
#Attention New York, North Carolina, Oklahoma & Idaho:

#This is your last day to register to vote!

Do it now:  https://vote.gov/

------------------

* Idaho:  You can register in person on election day




-----------------



* North Carolina:  You can register and vote in person at one-stop sites during the early voting period, which runs from October 15-31

-------------

* Also, West Virginia, Maryland, Minnesota, Kansas, Oregon New Jersey, Virginia, Washington D.C., Massachusetts & Wisconsin you only have three or four days left. 

# Don't wait. Register now! -  https://vote.gov/

---------------
